price: N’iyo babwiwe bati “Ni iki Nyagasani wanyu yamuhishuriye (Muhamadi)?” Baravuga bati “Ni imigani y’abo hambere.”
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُم مَّاذَآ أَنزَلَ رَبُّكُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qīla lahum mādhā anzala rabbukum qālū asāṭīru al-awalīna
